design_system.name: DadRock Tabs - The Analog Stage
design_system.description: A gritty, authentic rock-and-roll aesthetic that merges the warmth of vintage tube amps with the precision of a modern database. Dark, high-contrast, and texture-rich.

usage.surface_card: bg-card border border-white/5 hover:border-primary/50 transition-colors duration-300

textures.noise_overlay: fixed inset-0 z-50 pointer-events-none opacity-[0.03] mix-blend-overlay bg-[url('https://grainy-gradients.vercel.app/noise.svg')]

buttons.default: h-12 px-8 rounded-md font-bold uppercase tracking-wider transition-all duration-300 transform hover:-translate-y-1 active:translate-y-0

inputs.search_hero: h-16 text-xl bg-black/50 border-2 border-white/20 focus:border-primary focus:ring-0 rounded-full px-8 backdrop-blur-md text-white placeholder:text-white/40

cards.video_card: group relative overflow-hidden bg-card rounded-xl border border-white/5 hover:border-primary/50 transition-all duration-500

hero_bg.alt: Silhouette of guitarist on stage with orange spotlight
hero_bg.usage: Hero section background with heavy overlay

texture_accent.usage: About page or featured section background

accessibility.contrast_check: Ensure all text on image backgrounds has a semi-transparent black overlay (bg-black/60 or higher).

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add the Google Fonts import to index.css immediately.
2. SETUP TAILWIND: Update tailwind.config.js with the colors and font families defined above.
3. GLOBAL STYLES: Add the noise overlay to the body in App.js or index.css.
4. COMPONENT OVERRIDES: When using Shadcn components, override the default radius to '0.5rem' or '0.75rem' but keep borders subtle.
5. NOISE TEXTURE: Implement the noise texture as a fixed div in the root layout.
6. AD PAGE: The ad page must feature the vinyl record image spinning (animate-spin-slow) with the countdown timer in the center.
7. ADMIN PANEL: Keep it high-density. Use the 'Mixing Console' image as the background for the login page only. The dashboard itself should be clean dark gray/black.
8. SEARCH: The search bar is the main character of the home page. Make it huge.
9. DATA-TESTID: Add data-testid attributes to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, links).
universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for backgrounds, use solid dark colors + noise.
Always add hover states to interactive elements.
